It’s party time! The Flicks contest brings many reasons to celebrate and gather. As you all know that the Firefox Flicks ‘12 contest has come to an end and the results[1] were declared.

All the entries were just amazing and our judges[2] had a tough time to declare the winners. ;)
Take a look at the showreel of some of the best submissions of Firefox Flicks 2012!

On this event, our Mozilla India has planned a Flicks Party at News Cafe, Hyderabad this Saturday i.e., 26th of May to celebrate the success of the contest. At the event we will be screening all the winning videos followed by some nice music and dinner! ;)

Also, we are expecting a special guest to the party. ‘Anahita Gottipati’, who won prize for the Bay Area Video Coalition category.

Come join us and be part of the celebration. 


Please Note that the accommodation at the venue is limited and the entry is by invitation only. If interested in joining the fun, contact Galaxy[igalaxyk@gmail.com] or Vineel [pindivineelreddy@gmail.com] for more details.

Thanks to everyone who took the time to make and submit a video to help us share the story of Firefox with the world.

For any questions, please contact either me (@GalaxyK) or Vineel (@vineelreddy).

[1] https://firefoxflicks.mozilla.org
[2] https://firefoxflicks.mozilla.org/en-US/judges
